website_summaries.verdict: Natural ingredients that treat jet lag as well as motion sickness.
pros: For long flights, these pills are effective for fighting nausea and jet lag for many
If you need more than motion sickness treatment, these are a great option
cons: Some customers did not find these tablets effective in preventing jet lag

customer_reviews.title: These really work for car sickness
customer_reviews.text: My wife swears by these. They really seem to help with the difficulties she has in long car/bus trips. She used them again recently on a long trip in Spain and Portugal with many hours on a bus. She's been using them for years.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrol

customer_reviews.title: Help without side effects
customer_reviews.text: I was given a few of these tablets on a trip to Turkey a few years ago during a 13 hour bus ride. I tend to get motion sick and these little tablets really helped without any side effects. When I returned home I immediately purchased some to have on hand when I travel. I just returned from a cruise and used them during the cruise and also while at Disney World and all those rides. They help keep my stomach calm.
customer_reviews.author: Birdies GMA

customer_reviews.title: TripEase helps in more ways than one!
customer_reviews.text: Due to an ear problem, I get dizzy if I change position too fast. So I was dizzy often during my water aerobics class! But taking one of these pills about 20 minutes before my class, overcomes 95% of the dizziness. Also, it helps with motion sickness while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie Eskes

customer_reviews.title: worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy to have found this product. I have taken Bonine before which also works great but I usually need a nap when I arrive at my destination. This time was such a short flight it seemed silly to take something that lasts for 24 hours. This was the perfect solution.
customer_reviews.author: A2A

customer_reviews.title: I gave it to a friend who easily gets motion sickness and was told that it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used it on several trips and it does work as I have reordered this item. I gave it to a friend who easily gets motion sickness and was told that it is effective for that person.
customer_reviews.author: Pono the poi dog

customer_reviews.title: Finally, something that works!
customer_reviews.text: I have been battling motion sickness since I was a child. From plane, boat and car rides I am naturally a nauseous person. I even have a prescription strength anti nausea medication that doesn't help. However, my mother introduced me to TripEase and I absolutely love it! There is zero side effects and it works wonders for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kaysie A. Pezzella

customer_reviews.title: Made it for 7 days just fine! love trip ease
customer_reviews.text: took this with my on my cruise. Everytime I felt a little queasy, I just took two. Made it for 7 days just fine! love trip ease!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Parks

customer_reviews.title: Really works...especially for land excursions
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely sensitive to motion and use these for long distance rides, on busses, and metros.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Simon

customer_reviews.title: Has tobacco in it
customer_reviews.text: I didn't notice that it has tabacum in it. This stuff should be a controlled substance. It made me sicker than a dog! Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Kim K.

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this on car trip, airplane and boats. I love that it's homeopathic and not a strong medicine I'm putting in my body and was safe while pregnant while I was traveling. :)
customer_reviews.author: clong

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: we use it for dizziness- works very well and is homeopathic which we like
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as sick as usual.
customer_reviews.text: Also used wrist bands and had less than usual sickness.
customer_reviews.author: robert

product_meta.title: Miers Laboratories Trip Ease, Multi, One Size
product_meta.description:
Homeopathic remedy helps to alleviate motion sickness due to travel by boat, car, train, or plane .

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Homeopathic remedy effective in countering motion sickness
feature_bullets: Enough for at least 30 hours of travel
